@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev The escrow smart contract for the open bazaar trades in Ethereum
The smart contract is desgined keeping in mind the current wallet interface of the OB-core
https://github.com/OpenBazaar/wallet-interface/blob/master/wallet.go
Current wallet interface strictly adheres to UTXO(bitcoin) model
attributes.name: EscrowWithoutToken

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Transaction is either in dispute or released state"

attributes.type: literal_string "Transaction is either in dispute or released state"
attributes.value: Transaction is either in dispute or released state

attributes.documentation:
dev Add new transaction in the contract
param _buyer The buyer of the transaction
param _seller The seller of the listing associated with the transaction
param _moderators List of moderators for this transaction. For now only single moderator
param scriptHash keccak256 hash of the redeem script
param threshold Minimum number of singatures required to released funds
param timeoutHours Hours after which seller can release funds into his favour by signing transaction
edeem Script format will be following
<uniqueId: 20><threshold:1><timeoutHours:4><buyer:20><seller:20><moderator:20>
scripthash-> keccak256(uniqueId, threshold, timeoutHours, buyer, seller, moderator)
ass amount of the ethers to be put in escrow
lease keep in mind you will have to add moderators fees also in the value
attributes.name: addTransaction

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Threshold is greater than total owners"

attributes.type: literal_string "Threshold is greater than total owners"
attributes.value: Threshold is greater than total owners

attributes.documentation:
dev Allows buyer of the transaction to add more funds in the transaction. This will help to cater scenarios wherein initially buyer missed to fund transaction as required
param scriptHash script hash of the transaction
attributes.name: addFundsToTransaction

attributes.documentation:
dev Allows one of the moderator to collect all the signature to solve dispute and submit it to this method.
If all the required signatures are collected and consensus has been reached than funds will be released to the voted party
param sigV Array containing V component of all the signatures(signed by each moderator)
param sigR Array containing R component of all the signatures(signed by each moderator)
param signS Array containing S component of all the signature(signed by each moderator)
param scriptHash script hash of the transaction
param uniqueId bytes20 unique id for the transaction, generated by ETH wallet
param destinations address of the destination in whose favour dispute resolution is taking place. In case of split payments it will be address of the split payments contract
param amounts value to send to each destination
attributes.name: execute

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Calculated script hash does not match passed script hash"

attributes.type: literal_string "Calculated script hash does not match passed script hash"
attributes.value: Calculated script hash does not match passed script hash

attributes.type: function (uint8[] memory,bytes32[] memory,bytes32[] memory,bytes32,address[] memory,uint256[] memory) returns (address)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount to be sent should be greater than 0"

attributes.type: literal_string "Amount to be sent should be greater than 0"
attributes.value: Amount to be sent should be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Total value to be sent is greater than the transaction value"

attributes.type: literal_string "Total value to be sent is greater than the transaction value"
attributes.value: Total value to be sent is greater than the transaction value
